section.p: When you tell him about the ticket in his hat he gives you a look of steely-eyed outrage.
‘It is my taboo label, you oaf! It signals to all and sundry that I am in ritual seclusion and should not be approached.’

Having broken the taboo, you can only try to set matters right with a benediction.
Make a SANCTITY roll at a Difficulty of 14 .
